name: get_5_day_historical_daily_prices
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stock_prices.
Tool description: Returns the adjusted open, high, low, and close price for a given symbol.  Volume, dividend, and stock split information is also included for each symbol.
API description: Fetches 5 days of historical daily stock prices including adjusted Open, High, Low, Close prices, daily volume, dividend, and split information for a given ticker symbol.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve historical data.
